utils.unnormalize_box(bbox, width, height)[source]¶

This function un-normalizes the bbox of words Param : bbox Param-type : list, list having coordinates of bounding box Param : width Param-type : float, width of bbox Param : height Param-type : float, height of bbox Returns : quad
